mapper.sql: select a.*, s.label shopitem_label, s.art art, art.label art_label, art.props art_props, art.cat "art_cat", artcat.label "art_cat_label", u.label "uid_label", g.label "gid_label" from cartitem a left join shopitem s on a.shopitem = s.id left join art on s.art = art.id left join artcat on art.cat = artcat.id left join "user" u on a.uid = u.id left join "group" g on a.gid = g.id
